description:
Karim Benzema, forward for Real Madrid, sustained a thigh injury while training shortly before the World Cup, and has had to sit out all games he was scheduled to play for France to this point. He has refused to rule out a return to the field for the World Cup final, and excitement is growing on rumors that he may fly out to Qatar for France's upcoming match against Argentina.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Karim Benzema engages in any playtime during the World Cup final match between Argentina and France, scheduled for December 18, 2022. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market may only resolve once the game is complete. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the French national football team, FIFA, Karim Benzema, and/or footage of the upcoming match between France and Argentina, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

markets.question: Will Karim Benzema play in the France v. Argentina World Cup Final?

title: Will Karim Benzema play in the France v. Argentina World Cup Final?
